author: Screendoor69 ✌🎶 🦁 🌊 🌞
text:
Literally nothing about my #trans grandchild has changed by him speaking his truth out loud. Not personality...interests...clothes...
grades...he's the same person, except that now he's empowered to be himself, and knows the standard for how others should treat him.  #gay #love

author: Screendoor69 ✌🎶 🦁 🌊 🌞
text: I am so proud of my grandchild who has let us know that while he was assigned female at birth, he is transgender and identifies as as a boy. He has chosen a new name and told us he prefers to be referred to as "he". Love and support your children always. #trans #love #pride https://t.co/LQX3fqWQBb

text:
